title: Espresso Mini Muffins with Chocolate Ganache

user_comments.comment: To much ingredients. To much time. Taste is very wrong. Dont ever try to cook this. This is not good!!!
To much ingredients. To much time. Taste is very wrong. Dont ever try to cook this. This is not good!!!
This is a really tasty recipe. Even the kids like it! It is also easy to make. This is my new favorite.

ingredients.name: Almond Flour
ingredients.original_line: 3/4 cups Almond Meal Or Almond Flour

instructions.original_line: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a mini muffin tin well with coconut oil or greasing method of your choice.

sub.instruction: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F

instructions.original_line: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease a mini muffin tin well with coconut oil or greasing method of your choice.

sub.instruction: Grease a mini muffin tin well with coconut oil or greasing method of your choice

instructions.original_line: In a food processor, combine all the dry ingredients for the muffins: almond meal, ground espresso beans, baking soda, nutmeg, and salt.

sub.instruction: In a food processor, combine all the dry ingredients for the muffins: almond meal, ground espresso beans, baking soda, nutmeg, and salt

instructions.original_line: Pulse to combine.

sub.instruction: Pulse to combine

instructions.original_line: Add in the wet ingredients for the muffins: egg, coconut oil, maple syrup, and vanilla.

sub.instruction: Add in the wet ingredients for the muffins: egg, coconut oil, maple syrup, and vanilla

instructions.original_line: Mix on high until everything is nice and smooth.

sub.instruction: Mix on high until everything is nice and smooth

instructions.original_line: Fill greased muffin tins 3/4 of the way full.

sub.instruction: Fill greased muffin tins 3/4 of the way full

instructions.original_line: You should have just enough to make 12, if you really scrape the bowl clean.

sub.instruction: You should have just enough to make 12, if you really scrape the bowl clean

instructions.original_line: Bake for 8-9 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

sub.instruction: Bake for 8-9 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean

instructions.original_line: Do not over bake!

sub.instruction: Do not over bake!

instructions.original_line: Allow muffins to cool

sub.instruction: Allow muffins to cool

instructions.original_line: Make the ganache

sub.instruction: Make the ganache

instructions.original_line: In a microwave safe bowl, combine the coconut milk and chocolate, microwave for 30 seconds, stir, microwave for 15 more seconds if it is not melted

sub.instruction: In a microwave safe bowl, combine the coconut milk and chocolate
microwave for 30 seconds
stir
microwave for 15 more seconds if it is not melted

instructions.original_line: Be careful not to burn it

sub.instruction: Be careful not to burn it

instructions.original_line: Top muffins with desired amount of ganache

sub.instruction: Top muffins with desired amount of ganache

instructions.original_line: Enjoy!

sub.instruction: Enjoy!

title: Grilled Chicken with Tangy Miso Honey Mustard Sauce

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard Salad Dressing
ingredients.original_line: 1- 1/2 cup Honey Mustard Salad Dressing, Divided

instructions.original_line: The sauce can be made up to a week ahead and stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator, and is also delicious served with poached chicken or grilled shrimp.

sub.instruction: The sauce can be made up to a week ahead and stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator, and is also delicious served with poached chicken or grilled shrimp

instructions.original_line: Place the miso paste in a small bowl and slowly whisk in 1 cup of the honey mustard dressing.

sub.instruction: Place the miso paste in a small bowl
slowly whisk in 1 cup of the honey mustard dressing

instructions.original_line: Set aside.

sub.instruction: Set aside

instructions.original_line: Reserve the remaining honey mustard dressing for basting the chicken.

sub.instruction: Reserve the remaining honey mustard dressing for basting the chicken

instructions.original_line: Preheat the grill to medium heat.

sub.instruction: Preheat the grill to medium heat

instructions.original_line: Brush each piece of chicken with honey mustard dressing.

sub.instruction: Brush each piece of chicken with honey mustard dressing

instructions.original_line: Lightly oil the grill grate.

sub.instruction: Lightly oil the grill grate

instructions.original_line: Grill the chicken over indirect heat for 18 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally, or until the juices run clear.

sub.instruction: Grill the chicken over indirect heat for 18 to 20 minutes
turning occasionally
or until the juices run clear

instructions.original_line: When grilling the chicken thighs, place them skin side down first.

sub.instruction: When grilling the chicken thighs, place them skin side down first

instructions.original_line: Baste occasionally with the reserved dressing during the last 10 minutes.

sub.instruction: Baste occasionally with the reserved dressing during the last 10 minutes

instructions.original_line: Watch carefully to prevent burning.

sub.instruction: Watch carefully to prevent burning

instructions.original_line: In a small saucepan, gently warm the miso honey mustard sauce.

sub.instruction: In a small saucepan, gently warm the miso honey mustard sauce

instructions.original_line: Serve with the grilled chicken.

sub.instruction: Serve with the grilled chicken

ingredients.name: shortening
ingredients.original_line: 1 tablespoon shortening (NOT butter, margarine, spread or oil)

instructions.original_line: Place both chips and shortening in small microwave-safe bowl.

sub.instruction: Place both chips and shortening in small microwave-safe bowl

instructions.original_line: Microwave at High 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until chips are melted and mixture is smooth when stirred.

sub.instruction: Microwave at High 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until chips are melted and mixture is smooth when stirred

instructions.original_line: Stir in peanuts.

sub.instruction: Stir in peanuts

instructions.original_line: Drop by teaspoons into 1-inch diameter candy or petit four papers.

sub.instruction: Drop by teaspoons into 1-inch diameter candy or petit four papers

instructions.original_line: Refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes.

sub.instruction: Refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes

instructions.original_line: Store tightly covered in refrigerator.

sub.instruction: Store tightly covered in refrigerator

ingredients.name: jalapeno
ingredients.original_line: 1/2 to 1 jalapeno, seeded and finely chopped

ingredients.name: plum tomatoes
ingredients.original_line: 7 plum tomatoes (about 14 ounces), halved, seeds squeezed out, and diced

ingredients.name: pepper
ingredients.original_line: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

instructions.original_line: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.

sub.instruction: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat

instructions.original_line: Add the onion, garlic, jalapeno, and celery, season with pepper, and cook, stirring, until soft and fragrant, about 4 minutes.

sub.instruction: Add the onion, garlic, jalapeno, and celery, season with pepper,
cook, stirring, until soft and fragrant, about 4 minutes

instructions.original_line: Add the tomatoes, olives, and capers and cook, stirring, until hot, about 2 minutes more.

sub.instruction: Add the tomatoes, olives, and capers
cook, stirring, until hot, about 2 minutes more

instructions.original_line: Remove from the heat and stir in the lemon juice and parsley.

sub.instruction: Remove from the heat
stir in the lemon juice and parsley

ingredients.name: pistachio ice cream
ingredients.original_line: pistachio ice cream (1/3 cup or 3 scoops)

instructions.original_line: Place ice cream in a bowl.

sub.instruction: Place ice cream in a bowl

instructions.original_line: Sprinkle with brownie chunks.

sub.instruction: Sprinkle with brownie chunks

instructions.original_line: Drizzle with hot fudge.

sub.instruction: Drizzle with hot fudge

instructions.original_line: Cover with whipped cream and sprinkle with chopped pistachios.

sub.instruction: Cover with whipped cream and sprinkle with chopped pistachios
